meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 1년 쓸 수 있겠지? I would be able to use it for a year right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 25 🦊
vlive.english: I would be able to use it for a year right?

vlive.korean: 너 뭐하려고 했어? 검정색 하나만 쓸 거야? What are you going to do? Are you only painting it black? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: What are you going to do? Are you only painting it black?

vlive.korean: '같은 방 쓸 때도 저렇게 게임했어요?' "When you shared rooms, did he play games like that too?" 듣기 View video iKON : 잠깐 쉬는시간~!
vlive.english: "When you shared rooms, did he play games like that too?"

vlive.korean: [궁예] - 근데 그걸 첫판부터 - 쓸 수 없어? [Gung Ye] - But this is the first round. - Can't we use it? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: [Gung Ye] - But this is the first round. - Can't we use it?

vlive.korean: 여러분 방송사고 아니에요 - 뭔가 자유롭게 쓸 수 있을 것 같아, 그렇지? Everyone, we didn't curse. - We can say it freely, right? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: Everyone, we didn't curse. - We can say it freely, right?

examples.korean: The carpet is worn but still serviceable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 카펫은 낡았지만 아직 쓸 만하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The shaver will run off batteries or mains. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 (전기) 면도기는 배터리로도 쓸 수 있고 전원에 꽂아서도 쓰 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Margarine can be substituted for butter in this recipe. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 조리법에서는 마가린을 버터 대용으로 쓸 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Watch how you use those scissors—you could do yourself a mischief! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가위 쓸 때 조심해. 잘못하면 다쳐! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Watch how you use those scissors—you could do yourself a mischief! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Acrylic paints can be used to create large, flat blocks of colour. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아크릴 페인트는 넓은 면적에 고르게 채색할 때 쓸 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
